content.query:
USE woca_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE bronze.usp_create_views 
@folder NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_view_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX);

    SET @create_view_sql_stmt = 
        'CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_'+ @folder + '
            AS
            SELECT
            *
            FROM
                OPENROWSET(
                    BULK ''https://asawocastaccdl.dfs.core.windows.net/asa-woca-adlfs-wsp-cnt/bronze/' + @folder + '/**'',
                    FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
                ) AS [result]'
    print(@create_view_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_view_sql_stmt;

END;

-- Then use a Stored Procedure in the Pipeline to call this procedure
